paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on BRCA2 variants, including penetrance data and individual records.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: They found 14 pathogenic mutations in five genes in 555 lung adenocarcinoma cases, with a frequency of 2.5%. Among DDR genes, ATM had the highest level of mutations (50%), followed by BRCA2 (7%).

functional_data.summary: BRCA2 mutations are associated with a higher relative risk incidence of lung adenocarcinoma.

variants.additional_notes: The study indicates a small subset of patients with inherited susceptibility due to DDR deficiencies.
key_quotes: Among DDR genes, ATM had the highest level of mutations (50%), followed by BRCA2 (7%).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was identified in the context of lung adenocarcinoma.
